analysis.key_quote: I am concerned that this change will politicize numerous federal positions making it easier to simply dispose of otherwise qualified and effective people because they do not hew to the position of the administration in power.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the potential for politicization of federal positions and the loss of institutional knowledge, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule. It emphasizes the risks of prioritizing political loyalty over merit and effectiveness.
